name: Rogue Rabbit
description: Two kids are playing with action figures: Rogue Rabbit, a valiant bunny knight, faces his arch nemesis, Snamuel the Snake, the dark Slith Lord and leader of an army of snakes in a dark dungeon. However, neither of the friends can agree on the story - Rogue Rabbit's strength and speed keep changing as the story goes on. Even though Rogue Rabbit's stats are out of his control, he must not let the evil snakes prevail!
